response.overview: Naina has kept herself busy in her daily life, she misses Rohan a lot and prays to god everyday that if Rohan can come back. She can see the world now with Rohan's eyes, but she can't see Rohan, she has a sadness which emits on her face. One day suddenly a man enters in her life who has a same face and look like Rohan. He is Rohit from London, Rohit starts liking Naina and he proposes her for marriage. Naina initially says no but then with some circumstances she agrees to get married, but that was not a happy ending as during marriage ceremony Naina suddenly stands up and says no to Rohit and walks out.
response.title: Blind Love 2
